column1: Kata Robata////Update!  Now one of my go-to sushi places
column2: in part because they open late!  They serve a pretty solid ramen here (soy sauce-based)
column3: but it did have a slightly overwhelming ginger flavor.  The Hamachi Kama (yellow tail collar) serving is larger than most places and usually done pretty well.  Miso Lobster Mac & Cheese is very good; good amount of lobster and the panko crust really adds to the flavor.  Would also recommend the miso marinated black cod -  great fish and slightly sweetened with the miso glaze.  Pan seared Chilean sea bass is amazing... but this dish takes awhile to cook
column4: so don't order it if you're short on time!
